verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> unto the shepherds<WH7462> that destroy<WH6> and scatter<WH6327> the sheep<WH6629> of my pasture<WH4830>! saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, against the shepherds<WH7462> that feed<WH7462> my people<WH5971>: Ye have scattered<WH6327> my flock<WH6629>, and driven them away<WH5080>, and have not visited<WH6485> them<WH6485>; behold, I will visit upon you the evil<WH7455> of your doings<WH4611>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And I will gather<WH6908> the remnant<WH7611> of my flock<WH6629> out of all the countries<WH776> whither I have driven<WH5080> them<WH7725>, and will bring them again to their folds<WH5116>; and they shall be fruitful<WH6509> and multiply<WH7235>.

And I will set up<WH6965> shepherds<WH7462> over them<WH7462>, who shall feed them<WH3372>; and they shall fear no more<WH2865>, nor be dismayed, neither shall any be lacking<WH6485>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Behold <WH3117>, the days come<WH935>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that I will raise<WH6965> unto David<WH1732> a righteous<WH6662> Branch<WH6780>, and he shall reign<WH4427> as king<WH4428> and deal wisely<WH7919>, and shall execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in the land<WH776>.

In his days<WH3117> Judah<WH3063> shall be saved<WH3467>, and Israel<WH3478> shall dwell<WH7931> safely<WH983>; and this is his name<WH8034> whereby he shall be called<WH7121>: Jehovah our righteousness<WH3072>.

Therefore <WH3117>, behold, the days come<WH935>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that they shall no more say<WH559>, As Jehovah<WH3068> liveth<WH2416>, who brought up<WH5927> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>;

but <WH3068>, As Jehovah liveth<WH2416>, who brought up<WH5927> and who led<WH935> the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> out of the north<WH6828> country<WH776>, and from all the countries<WH776> whither I had driven<WH5080> them<WH3427>. And they shall dwell in their own land<WH127>.

Concerning the prophets<WH5030>. My heart<WH3820> within<WH7130> me is broken<WH7665>, all my bones<WH6106> shake<WH7363>; I am like a drunken<WH7910> man<WH376>, and like a man<WH1397> whom wine<WH3196> hath overcome<WH5674>, because<WH6440> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and because of his holy<WH6944> words<WH1697>.

For the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of adulterers<WH5003>; for because<WH6440> of swearing<WH423> the land<WH776> mourneth<WH56>; the pastures<WH4999> of the wilderness<WH4057> are dried up<WH3001>. And their course<WH4794> is evil<WH7451>, and their might is not right<WH1369>;
for both prophet<WH5030> and priest<WH3548> are profane<WH2610>; yea<WH1004>, in my house have I found<WH4672> their wickedness<WH7451>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Wherefore their way<WH1870> shall be unto them as slippery<WH2519> places in the darkness<WH653>: they shall be driven on<WH1760>, and fall<WH5307> therein<WH935>; for I will bring evil<WH7451> upon them<WH8141>, even the year of their visitation<WH6486>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And I have seen<WH7200> folly<WH8604> in the prophets<WH5030> of Samaria<WH8111>; they prophesied<WH5012> by Baal<WH1168>, and caused my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> to err<WH8582>.

In the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> also I have seen<WH7200> a horrible thing<WH8186>: they commit adultery<WH5003>, and walk<WH1980> in lies<WH8267>; and they strengthen<WH2388> the hands<WH3027> of evil-doers<WH7489>, so that none<WH376> doth return<WH7725> from his wickedness<WH7451>: they are all of them become unto me as Sodom<WH5467>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> thereof as Gomorrah<WH6017>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> concerning the prophets<WH5030>: Behold<WH398>, I will feed them with wormwood<WH3939>, and make them drink<WH8248> the water<WH4325> of gall<WH7219>; for from the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is ungodliness<WH2613> gone forth<WH3318> into all the land<WH776>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, Hearken<WH8085> not unto the words<WH1697> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> unto you<WH1891>: they teach you vanity; they speak<WH1696> a vision<WH2377> of their own heart<WH3820>, and not out of the mouth<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

They say<WH559> continually<WH559> unto them that despise<WH5006> me<WH3068>, Jehovah hath said<WH1696>, Ye shall have peace<WH7965>; and unto every one that walketh<WH1980> in the stubbornness<WH8307> of his own heart<WH3820> they say<WH559>, No evil<WH7451> shall come upon you<WH935>.
For who hath stood<WH5975> in the council<WH5475> of Jehovah<WH3068>, that he should perceive<WH7200> and hear<WH8085> his word<WH1697>? who hath marked<WH7181> my word<WH1697>, and heard it<WH8085>?

Behold <WH5591>, the tempest of Jehovah<WH3068>, even his wrath<WH2534>, is gone forth<WH3318>, yea<WH2342>, a whirling tempest<WH5591>: it shall burst<WH2342> upon the head<WH7218> of the wicked<WH7563>.

The anger<WH639> of Jehovah<WH3068> shall not return<WH7725>, until he have executed<WH6213>, and till he have performed<WH6965> the intents<WH4209> of his heart<WH3820>: in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117> ye shall understand<WH995> it perfectly<WH998>.
I sent<WH7971> not these prophets<WH5030>, yet they ran<WH7323>: I spake<WH1696> not unto them<WH5012>, yet they prophesied.

But if they had stood<WH5975> in my council<WH5475>, then had they caused my people<WH5971> to hear<WH8085> my words<WH1697>, and had turned<WH7725> them from their evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and from the evil<WH7455> of their doings<WH4611>.
Am I a God<WH430> at hand<WH7138>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and not a God<WH430> afar off<WH7350>?

Can any<WH376> hide<WH5641> himself in secret places<WH4565> so that I shall not see<WH7200> him<WH5002>? saith Jehovah<WH3068>. Do not I fill<WH4392> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>? saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
I have heard<WH8085> what the prophets<WH5030> have said<WH559>, that prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name<WH8034>, saying<WH559>, I have dreamed<WH2492>, I have dreamed<WH2492>.
How long shall this be<WH3426> in the heart<WH3820> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267>, even the prophets<WH5030> of the deceit<WH8649> of their own heart<WH3820>?

that think<WH2803> to cause my people<WH5971> to forget<WH7911> my name<WH8034> by their dreams<WH2472> which they tell<WH5608> every man<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>, as their fathers<WH1> forgat<WH7911> my name<WH8034> for Baal<WH1168>.

The prophet<WH5030> that hath a dream<WH2472>, let him tell<WH5608> a dream<WH2472>; and he that hath my word<WH1697>, let him speak<WH1696> my word<WH1697> faithfully<WH571>. What is the straw<WH8401> to the wheat<WH1250>? saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
Is not my word<WH1697> like<WH3541> fire<WH784>? saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>; and like a hammer<WH6360> that breaketh<WH6327> the rock<WH5553> in pieces<WH6327>?
Therefore <WH5030>, behold, I am against the prophets, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that steal<WH1589> my words<WH1697> every one<WH376> from his neighbor<WH7453>.
Behold <WH5030>, I am against the prophets, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that use<WH3947> their tongues<WH3956>, and say<WH5001>, He saith<WH5002>.

Behold <WH5012>, I am against them that prophesy lying<WH8267> dreams<WH2472>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and do tell<WH5608> them<WH5971>, and cause my people to err<WH8582> by their lies<WH8267>, and by their vain boasting<WH6350>: yet I sent<WH7971> them not<WH6680>, nor commanded them<WH3276>; neither do they profit this people<WH5971> at all<WH3276>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And when this people<WH5971>, or the prophet<WH5030>, or a priest<WH3548>, shall ask<WH7592> thee<WH559>, saying, What is the burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068>? then shalt thou say<WH559> unto them<WH4853>, What burden! I will cast<WH5203> you off<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

And as for the prophet<WH5030>, and the priest<WH3548>, and the people<WH5971>, that shall say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068>, I will even punish<WH6485> that man<WH376> and his house<WH1004>.

Thus shall ye say<WH559> every one<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>, and every one<WH376> to his brother<WH251>, What hath Jehovah<WH3068> answered<WH6030>? and<WH3068>, What hath Jehovah spoken<WH1696>?

And the burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068> shall ye mention<WH2142> no more<WH376>: for every man's own word<WH1697> shall be his burden<WH4853>; for ye have perverted<WH2015> the words<WH1697> of the living<WH2416> God<WH430>, of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> our God<WH430>.
Thus shalt thou say<WH559> to the prophet<WH5030>, What hath Jehovah<WH3068> answered<WH6030> thee<WH3068>? and, What hath Jehovah spoken<WH1696>?

But <WH518> if ye say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068>; therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>: Because ye say<WH559> this word<WH1697>, The burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and I have sent<WH7971> unto you<WH559>, saying, Ye shall not say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of Jehovah<WH3068>;

therefore <WH5377>, behold, I will utterly forget<WH5382> you<WH5203>, and I will cast you off<WH5892>, and the city that I gave<WH5414> unto you and to your fathers<WH1>, away from my presence<WH6440>:
and I will bring<WH5414> an everlasting<WH5769> reproach<WH2781> upon you<WH5769>, and a perpetual shame<WH3640>, which shall not be forgotten<WH7911>.
